rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with storage space and a small foyer, designed for natural light.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living area that seamlessly integrates the Scandinavian aesthetic of minimalism and functionality with comfortable seating and subtle interior lighting.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern, efficient kitchen with Scandinavian simplicity in design, ample storage, and integration into the living area for social interaction.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Space adjoining the living area, featuring a central dining table that enhances family gatherings and social interactions.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with en-suite bathroom, ensuring privacy and convenience for visitors.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an en-suite bathroom, walk-in closet, and a private balcony overlooking the central courtyard in adherence to Vastu principles.

openings.location: South side of plot (considered auspicious per Vastu)
openings.description: A welcoming entrance with proper alignment for energy flow and accessibility.
Large windows ensuring ample natural light, enhancing the Scandinavian aesthetic and improving air circulation.
Seamless transition that reinforces the open-plan design concept.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-lit bedroom designed for optimal energy flow with north-east exposure, adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Another bedroom ensuring privacy and tranquility with balanced interior design that reflects Scandinavian minimalism.

openings.location: Corner of the ground floor connecting to first floor
openings.description: Well-lit staircase designed for safety, easy navigation between levels and maintaining spatial harmony.
Providing access to the central courtyard and fresh air, in alignment with Vastu and Scandinavian design principles.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space located on the upper level to ensure a quiet working environment. The design emphasizes natural light, ergonomic furniture, and a minimalistic Scandinavian style.

rooms.name: Playroom/Study Room
rooms.description: Flexible area for children or additional study space, incorporating Scandinavian simplicity and functionality.

openings.description: Large window ensuring abundant natural light and a pleasant view of the courtyard.

openings.location: Connecting second floor to first floor and ground floor
openings.description: Elegant, open staircase design that enhances spatial flow and provides easy access between levels.

design_principles.description: Emphasizes minimalism, functionality, and natural light with clean lines and a neutral color palette.
Design structured across three levels to maximize space usage while providing privacy for different functions.
Incorporated by orienting major openings, rooms, and the courtyard to align with traditional Indian principles of energy flow.
A well-planned central courtyard that enhances ventilation, natural lighting, and creates a communal space for relaxation.
